title: EPIC-010: User Journey Validation - Check Token Balance

epic.title: User Journeys & System Events
epic.goal: Validate end-to-end user journeys (chat, manage dialogs, check balance, admin operations) and implement system events for observability and auditing

deliverables: Production-ready implementation strictly for this story scope
Automated tests required by acceptance criteria
Minimal documentation/README updates required to run/test the change
acceptance_criteria: Happy path: user calls GET /users/me/tokens, receives balance, total_used, limit
Validate: balance reflects deductions from previous messages
New user: default balance (0 or initial grant per config)
description: Validate end-to-end user journey: check token balance, view usage stats.
